titleStmt.title: De termino Pasche anno v.regni Regis Edwardi quarti

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, within Temple Barre at the signe of the hande and starre, by Rycharde Tottel,

notesStmt.note: Law reports for 5 Edward IV (Easter, Trinity, Michaelmas, and Hilary).
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: Temple Barre at the signe of the hande
